body.h1: WSO2 Business Rules Server (BRS) Documentation Index
body.p: Installation Guide : Gives basic steps on how to download, install, and run WSO2 BRS using the binary distribution, and how to build WSO2 BRS using the source distribution.

User Guide : A manual on how to run and configure the WSO2 BRS through the management console. The user guide is centered on a familiar and simple example. It walks you through each important step in creating, deploying, and managing a rule service through the management console.
Developer Guide : This is a guide for developing WSO2 BRS. If you are new to BRS and willing to contribute, this guide is for you.

How to Run the WSO2 BRS Samples : This document provides you with a set of BRS samples demonstrating various capabilities of the BRS. Each sample provides a comprehensive guide for creating, deploying, and testing the rule service presented in the sample.

How to extend the functionality already offered by the BRS : This document provides you a set of extensibility points in the BRS. Each extensibility can be leveraged to enhance the functionality offered by the BRS.
The WSO2 Oxygen Tank Library : The Library contains articles, tutorials, presentations, and other knowledge base items published on The Oxygen Tank.
Wiki Space : This is the working Wiki for WSO2 BRS.
